mapper.update: update post set departureDateTime=#{departureDateTime} where postID=#{postID}
mapper.select: select * from post where status <> '종료됨' and deletedDate is null and type='taxi' order by postID desc limit 0, 50;
select regionNo from region where regionName=#{regionName}
mapper.update: update post set region=#{region} where postID = #{postID};
mapper.insert: insert into push_job( param, pushType, createdDate ) values ( #{value}, 'newPostByDistance', NOW() );
mapper.select: select j.*, p.fromLatitude, p.fromLongitude, p.fromAddress, p.latitude, p.longitude, p.toAddress, p.userID from push_job j left outer join post p on p.postID=j.param where j.pushType='newPostByDistance' and (j.finishYN is null or j.finishYN <> 'Y')
mapper.update: update push_job set finishYN='Y', finishedDate = NOW() where pushID = #{pushID};
update new_post_push_data set pushResult = #{pushResult} where ID = #{ID}
